entry.title: Tuesday: Snow at times heavy. High plus 2.

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow ending this evening then clearing. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 this evening then light overnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023
